title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 48.1 - Transportation of logs and other materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 48.1 - Transportation of logs and other materials

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Motor Vehicles adopts 17 NYCRR section
820.5 as it relates to rules for protection against shifting or falling cargo
for all vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
48.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
